title: CEO Personal Assistant, Simultaneous Translator
skills:
In addition to the positions listed, I have worked as a freelance interpreter for the Embassy of the Republic of Mauritius in Moscow.  
I am an advanced PC user (MS Office, CAT tools, Bitrix, AutoCAD). 
I translated the web-site for AVC Advisory (Rus-Eng): https://www.avcadvisory.ru/en and the Russia 2020 Edition into Russian https://books.theoilandgasyear.com/books/zdog
Here is an example of my published translation: https://new-retail.ru/business/vernut_nelzya_ostavit_kak_dostoyno_vstretit_vozvrat_tovara/

Recommendations can be provided upon request

primary.name: Peoples' Friendship University of Russia, Moscow

experience.position: Personal Assistant to the Director, Interpreter
CEO Personal Assistant/National Translator of BNI Russia

experience.description:
(project work) 

- Translations (oral and written) as requested (presentations, documents, the web-site)
- Administrative support: editing or printing documents on an as needed basis, managing paperwork related to business trips arrangements, payments processings etc
- Manage day-to-day processes related to office management, ordering stationary, managing vacation lists etc
- Manage calendar 
- Provide support for supervisor’s meetings, minutes keeping

experience.position: Assistant to the Head of Department, Translator
experience.description:
- Electronic document management, business correspondence with company partners in Russian and English
- Translation of articles for publication on the company website
- Translation of contracts, meeting reports
- Maintaining the department's information database
- Consultation of employees on the issues of translation
- Supervising architects
- Supervising the execution of orders
- Business correspondence
- Technical assistance (copying, printing, scanning, preparing drawings)
- Operative research for information 
- Execution of personal orders
- Organization of meetings, meeting of clients

- Organization of excursions
- Call distribution
- Keeping records of income and expenses
- Consultations of tourists
- Routing
- Compilation and placement of ads on the Internet related to excursions
